display_long_description:
Bomb VR is a fast, explosive multiplayer game built for virtual reality.
The rules are simple: throw energy bombs to shatter the floor beneath your opponents and make them fall before they do the same to you. Every round is quick, intense, and full of laughter — perfect for quick sessions with friends.

Featuring physics-based destruction, smooth locomotion, and instant matchmaking, Bomb VR captures the fun of local party games in a competitive VR arena. You can play with friends online, test your agility in fast duels, and master the art of survival as the ground disappears under your feet.

Join the chaos, find creative ways to stay alive, and enjoy the thrill of blowing up your friends — all in immersive virtual reality!
